AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant who challenges the search of the tractor-trailer and argues about the Speedy Trial Act
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant who requested continuances to prepare for trial, with arguments regarding the thirty-day exclusion period
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss and presided over his trial, also ruled on Raymond McMillon's motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods, with requirements for ends-of-justice findings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.motion to dismiss the indictment: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz and Raymond McMillon, denied by the United States District Court
